Method.Title: Open Lock (A)
Method.Description: This command generates an operation code to open the lock using the inputs ATM ID, USER ID, TOUCH KEY ID, TIME, DATE, TIME BLOCK and LOCK STATUS.

Method.Title: Open Lock No Touch Key (A)
Method.Description: This command generates an operation code to open the lock using the inputs ATM ID, USER ID, TIME, DATE and TIME BLOCK.

Method.Title: Open Lock Now (1A)
Method.Description: This command generates an operation code to open the lock using the inputs ATM ID and USER ID.

Method.Title: Open Lock Now (2A)
Method.Description: This command generates an operation code to open the lock using the inputs ATM ID and USER ID (2A).

Method.Title: Close Code (A)
Method.Description: This command will close an active operation code.

Method.Title: Close Code Via A Seal (A)
Method.Description: This command will close an operation code using the A Seal value.
